item.title: Comprehensive guide to principled and user-friendly website design in 2025
item.description:
Introduction

This is my first article, where I begin sharing my thoughts and experiences in web design. I will continue documenting lessons learned, insights gained, and evolving perspectives as I navigate the digital world. If you’d like to follow along, feel free to keep reading and share your thoughts. I’m Saleh Toodarvari, and this space is where I explore real lessons and practical approaches to digital design. Your feedback will help shape this journey.
